Hello

This is the re-learn live demo, where re-learn has been used to provide a tutorial for the classic to-do list.

When you've worked through the tutorial you can use the controls above to reset the tutorial to try it again or try out help mode. You can also refer to the source code and documentation at https://github.com/oliyh/re-learn.

re-learn gives you data-driven tutorials for reagent components with no changes required to your dom.

The Todo-MVC example was taken from tastejs/todomvc, with thanks to Matthew Jaoudi, Dmitri Sotnikov and Dan Holmsand.
